style.css:
@-moz-document url-prefix('http://trendy.nikkeibp.co.jp/') {
body > div.gnav-201401,
body > div#header,
body > div#expand_header *,
body > div#gnav2,
body > div#lnavi,
body > div#colline,
body > div#wrapper > div.content > div.rightarea,
body > div#wrapper > div.content > div.main > div.common_content,
body > div#wrapper > div.content > div.main > div#jsSedueRelated > div.featureBox,
body > div#wrapper > div.content > div.main > div.featured,
body > div#wrapper > div.content > div.main > div.top_news,
body > div#wrapper > div.content > div.main> div#jsCateList1,
body > div#wrapper > div.content > div.main> div#pickup,
body > div#wrapper > div.content > div.main> div.news_latest_under,
body > div#wrapper > div.content > div.main> div.top_books
{
  display: none;
}
}
